fieldUpdates.description: This "Field Update" updates the Status field value to "Approvals" .
fieldUpdates.name: Field Update to Seek Approval

fieldUpdates.description: The records which are not approved should move to Review by Research Office
fieldUpdates.name: Status Update to Review by Research Offi

fieldUpdates.description: The Approved status records should be moved to "Ready for Submission to Funding Body"
fieldUpdates.literalValue: Ready for Submission to Funding Body
fieldUpdates.name: Status update for Approval
